name: CEMENTOS MOLINS INDUSTRIAL, S.A.U.
goal: Nuestra empresa dispone de una fábrica que produce y comercializa cementos Portland y de aluminato de calcio.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Iniciativas y reglamentación relacionadas con la producción y comercialización de materiales de la construcción.
